meanings.definition: Confidence or certainty in one's abilities or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: Her assuredness in her skills helped her succeed in the competition.
meanings.sent2: His assuredness in his decision made him stand firm in the face of criticism.
meanings.sent3: The cat's assuredness in catching the mouse was evident in its playful stalking.
meanings.sent4: The tree's assuredness in its roots kept it standing tall during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's assuredness in the subject made the students trust her explanations.

meanings.definition: The state of being free from doubt or uncertainty.
meanings.sent1: The traveler felt assuredness when he finally found the right direction.
meanings.sent2: The child's assuredness after finding his lost toy was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The cake's assuredness in being delicious was confirmed by the smiles of the guests.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's assuredness in its grandeur left the hikers in awe.
meanings.sent5: The detective's assuredness in solving the case led to the capture of the criminal.
